title.rendered: “IDF Continues Offensive in Gaza: Targeting Hamas Gliders and Terror Cells”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

IDF forces continue fighting in the Gaza Strip; fighter jets attacked a storage facility for gliders used by Hamas’s aerial unit in the Rafah area.

Forces from Brigadier General 162 continue the fighting in the Rafah area. In the past day, during raids in the area, the soldiers destroyed several tunnels and eliminated a number of terrorists.
Combat team forces from the Nahal Brigade identified a cell of three terrorists who fired RPGs at the forces. Shortly thereafter, the forces directed an aircraft that attacked and eliminated the cell near the tunnel.

Forces from Brigadier General 99 continue fighting in the city of Gaza.
Combat team soldiers from the ‘Alexander’ Brigade (3), during face-to-face encounters and in cooperation with the Air Force, eliminated several terrorists in the past day.

Last night, fighter jets attacked a glider storage facility used by Hamas’s aerial unit in the Rafah area. These gliders were used by Hamas terrorists in the massacre of October 7.

Attached is documentation from the IDF attacks in the Gaza Strip: https://bit.ly/3Y1lt05

Attached are photos from the activities of IDF forces in the Gaza Strip: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC13072024254365
